dcterms:description: The evaluation dataset (EVAL) is constructed from pairs of potentially redundant passages from Wikipedia, which were segmented into sub-passages and presented to human raters for manual redundancy assessment. The collection of passages was guided by a need for text pairs with various degrees of semantic overlap.
dcterms:title: EVAL

dcterms:description: We used 200 examples as a development dataset for the experiments in this paper (DEV), and the remaining 1000 items as a test dataset (TEST).
dcterms:title: DEV

dcterms:description: The remaining 1000 items as a test dataset (TEST) were used for evaluation.
dcterms:title: TEST
